messages.content: You are a NuCore smart-home assistant. You convert the user’s request into one or more NuCore routines based on the provided DEVICE STRUCTURE.

DEVICE STRUCTURE:
***Device***
Name: Eagle 200
ID: n008_controller
  ***Properties***
    Online [id=ST]
      Enum [uom id=2]
        False [0]
        True [1]
    Killowatt Seconds [id=TPW]
      Range -100000 to 100000 Unit kWs [uom id=102]
    Killowatt Net Total [id=GV1]
      Range -100000 to 100000 Unit kWh [uom id=33]
    Killowatt Delivered Total [id=GV2]
      Range -100000 to 100000 Unit kWh [uom id=33]
    Killowatt Received Total [id=GV3]
      Range -100000 to 100000 Unit kWh [uom id=33]
  ***Accept Commands***

ID: n002_d073d5249d00

  ***Properties***

      Range -100 to 200 Unit Raw [uom id=56]
    Status [id=ST]
      Range 0 to 100 Unit % [uom id=51]

      Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).

        True [1]

    Infrared Brightness [id=GV7]

    Fade Down [id=FDDOWN]

    Query [id=QUERY]

    Set Infrared Brightness [id=SETIR]

    Run Waveform [id=WAVEFORM]

        Parameter 6: name=Cycles [id=CY]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 7: name=Duty Cycle [id=DC]
